name: Othello Expansion
description:
Every time you fill the Othello board, the board gradually gets bigger
Count the number of stones for each board
Finally, the color with the most stones wins!

You can choose CPU mode or Both. mode.

If you feel sick, look at the red part in the center.

This is a game for Windows.
Operate with the mouse and left click.
Shut down with the Esc key.

This game is for "2020 Epic MegaJam".

I created everything during the jam except the background and effect material. Othello's AI is also within the jam period.

「List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.」

・Lightning / Electricity VFX Pack

    https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/ja/product/electricity-lightning-vfx-pa...

    Used for explosions and electric effects! Very easy to apply and change, I love this!

・Realistic Rendering Showcase

    https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US/blog/new-release-realistic-rendering-showcase...

    Used it as a background! Cubemap to keep it to 100MB
